feed.title: Combined summary - The DCS Theorem - theory for understanding blockchain scalability

entry.title: Combined summary - The DCS Theorem - theory for understanding blockchain scalability
entry.summary: Greg and Trent McConaghy have independently discovered the DCS Triangle, which is a significant tool for understanding blockchain scalability and blocksize-related debates. The DCS Theorem, a probability proof of the triangle, can be found on arXiv, and interested readers can follow the link provided. It is important to note that Greg has requested individuals not to email him anything they are not comfortable sharing with the NSA.
